verbose_text: XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR Furthermore, ADAM-17 also mediates the release of membrane bound precursors of proinflammatory cytokines (tumor necrosis factor-alpha, interferon-gamma, and interleukin-4) into the circulation.
